title: fried sea bream, fennel salad, warm beetroot jelly and brown shrimp vinaigrette
description: This restaurant-style fish dish is actually quite straightforward and is guaranteed to impress.
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 oranges, 2 peeled, segmented and diced, 2 zested and juiced
50ml/2fl oz white balsamic vinegar or sweet white wine vinegar
4 sea bream fillets, pin bones removed
